## jx uninstall

Uninstall the Jenkins X platform

### Synopsis


Uninstalls the Jenkins X platform from a kubernetes cluster

```
jx uninstall
```

### Examples

```
  # Uninstall the Jenkins X platform
  jx uninstall
```

* [jx](jx.md)	 - jx is a command line tool for working with Jenkins X
